Name: Pick Me Up Energy Bites
IngredientList: 2/3 sup - toasted, shredded coconut (sweetened or unsweetened - I use unsweetened to limit the amount of sugar)
1/2 cup - semisweet chocolate chips (I use mini chios and buy nondairy ones - still taste great)
InstructionList: Mix all ingredients in a bowl and refrigerate for 1-2 hours until the mixture is chilled.
Roll mixture into 1-inch balls.
These can be stored in a sealed container in the refrigerator for 1 week or in the freezer for up to 3 months.

Name: Breakfest Casserole
InstructionList: Cube bread and place evenly in greased 9x13 pan or baking dish.
Sprinkle evenly with sausage and cheese. Over ingredients in pan.
May cover and chill overnight. (if left overnight, remove from refrigerator 15 minutes
325 degrees or until set
Cut into squares to serve
Serves 8 to 10

Name: Quick Waffles
InstructionList: Beat whole eggs in a bowl until thick.
Beat milk, melted butter and vanilla into eggs.
In a separate bowl, combine remaining ingredients.
Sift into egg mixture, and mix well. Bake as directed.
YIELD: 6 - 8 WAFFLES
Variation: Cinnamon - Apple. Add 1 apple peeled and shredded, 1 tsp. vanilla and 1/2 tsp. cinnamon to batter.

Name: Pancakes
InstructionList: mix dry ingredients in separate bowL
mix wet ingredients in a bowl
then combine

Name: Tortilla Soup
InstructionList: add all ingredients to pot
Cock until beans are tender

Name: Yam Delight
InstructionList: Combine yams or sweet potatoes, sugar, milk, eggs, vanilla, salt and 1/2 stick melted butter.
Spoon into a 1 1/2 quart baking dish. Mix remaining ingredients and spread over potato mixture.
Bake at 350°, uncovered, for 30 to 40 minutes.
This can be made and baked a day or two ahead. A must for holidays!

Name: FRUIT DIP
InstructionList: Whip all ingredients with electric mixer.
Chill.
Serve

Name: JALAPENO DIP
IngredientList: 2 Ib. lean hamburger, fried and drained
InstructionList: Combine all in heavy pan or crock-pot and heat.
Serve with tortilla chips.

Name: NACHO DIP
IngredientList: 2 cans Cheddar cheese soup (10 oz. each)
InstructionList: Mix all ingredients and heat.
Serve as a hot dip with

Name: TOSTITO DIP
InstructionList: Dice and layer shredded Cheddar cheese, bell pepper, onion, tomato and lettuce.
Place mixture in a clear glass dish.
Layer vegetables, ending with lettuce. Use nacho chips to dip.

Name: DATE AND BACON ROLL
InstructionList: Cut bacon slices in half.
Roll date in bacon slice.
